fleece.translation[0].definitions[0].def: the woolly coat of a sheep, especially the wool and skin of a sheep when it has been made into a piece of clothing
fleece.translation[0].definitions[1].def: an artificial soft material used to make warm jackets
fleece.translation[0].definitions[2].def: a jacket made of this artificial material
fleece.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to charge someone too much money for something, especially by tricking them
fleece.translation[2].definitions[0].def: to charge someone too much money for something, usually by tricking them
fleece.translation[2].definitions[0].exa: He fleeced investors of more than $500,000 by selling the recording rights to songs he didnâ€™t own.
